meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat tuberculosis and other bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed rifampicin to cure the bacterial infection.
meanings.sent2: She took rifampicin daily to fight off the tuberculosis.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were no match for the powerful rifampicin!
meanings.sent4: Like a superhero, rifampicin swooped in to save the day from the bacterial invaders.
meanings.sent5: The rifampicin worked tirelessly to eliminate the harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: To treat with the antibiotic rifampicin.
meanings.sent1: The hospital staff rifampicined the patient to combat the infection.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often rifampicin patients with tuberculosis to help them recover.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria didn't stand a chance after being rifampicined.
meanings.sent4: She rifampicined the illness away with determination and medication.
meanings.sent5: The medical team rifampicined the patient back to health with care and expertise.
